name: Shaman

skills.name: Dispelling Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Exploit Weakness
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Recall
skills.raw_description:
Revives an ally with 50% of their HP. Places a [Shield] buff on the target equal to 20% of the target's HP.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
